parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The image ID. You can call [ListImages](~~449118~~) to obtain the image ID.

parameters.name: LabelFilter
parameters.description: The tag filter conditions, separated with commas (,). The format of a single condition filter is `key=value`. Takes effect independently from LabelKeys.

parameters.name: LabelKeys
parameters.description: The tag keys, separated with commas (,). System tags start with system and take effect independently from LabelFilter.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region where the image resides.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
